articles.title: Measles warning for holidaymakers heading to Europe - BBC
articles.description: As the summer holiday season gets going, families are being warned of measles outbreaks in many popular European destinations, with vaccination rates in the UK still far below what experts advise.
articles.content:
Dominic Hughes
Health experts warn that measles spreads very easily and can lead to some children suffering life-long consequences
Families travelling abroad this summer on holiday or to visit rela… [+4205 chars]
